abstract: University of Minnesota is asking others to come forward with similar complaints after third woman alleges sexual harassment by former athletic director Norwood Teague; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The University of Minnesota is responding to a third woman’s claims that she was sexually harassed by a former athletic director by asking that anyone else with similar allegations come forward.
snippet: The University of Minnesota is responding to a third woman’s claims that she was sexually harassed by a former athletic director by asking that anyone else with similar allegations come forward.
